response.original_title: Il Doge: A Portrait of Redemption
response.overview: After spending more than 36 years in prison, Giampaolo Manca, 'Il Doge', a former boss of the Mala del Brenta gang in Venice, Italy is on a path towards redemption, but he can't seem to forgive himself for the violent crimes of his past.
response.title: Il Doge: A Portrait of Redemption
